dialogue_turns.speaker: Narrator
dialogue_turns.text: 4 licenses have already been issued to entrepreneurs in Kazakhstan for industrial hemp production.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: four licenses have already been issued to entrepreneurs in Kazakhstan for industrial hemp production.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking has already issued four licenses to entrepreneurs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Vice Minister Azat Sultanov was really emphasizing the strict controls around this, you know, like forensic lab testing at multiple stages.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Vice Minister Azat Sultanov was really emphasizing the strict controls around this, you know, like forensic lab testing at multiple stages.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Secondly, laboratory tests will be conducted by forensic experts during the production process. As a result, the harvested crop will be strictly monitored.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he made it clear that not a single gram of narcotic hemp would make it into production. They're only allowing varieties with super low THC, like under 0.3 percent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he made it clear that not a single gram of narcotic hemp would make it into production. They're only allowing varieties with super low T H C, like under zero point three percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, not a single gram of narcotic hemp will make it into production, Sultanov said at a government briefing. Hemp (also called industrial hemp) is a plant with a low THC content (less than 0.3 percent).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and he mentioned that the Ministry of Internal Affairs is overseeing everything—fenced areas, guards, no unauthorized access.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and he mentioned that the Ministry of Internal Affairs is overseeing everything-fenced areas, guards, no unauthorized access.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the vice minister, representatives from the Ministry of Internal Affairs will oversee the entire process. The cultivation area will be fenced off, guarded, and access by unauthorized persons will be prohibited.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a huge deal, because obviously people are gonna worry about, uh, potential misuse or illegal growing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a huge deal, because obviously people are gonna worry about, uh, potential misuse or illegal growing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But he stressed that if any narcotic hemp is found during inspections, it gets destroyed immediately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. But he stressed that if any narcotic hemp is found during inspections, it gets destroyed immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If any narcotic hemp is found during inspections, it will be destroyed immediately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's interesting—he brought up that paper made from industrial hemp doesn't yellow, which is a cool practical benefit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's interesting-he brought up that paper made from industrial hemp doesn't yellow, which is a cool practical benefit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Industrial hemp is widely processed around the world—paper made from it doesn't yellow, he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I didn't know that! So it's not just about textiles or oils; there are these niche industrial uses too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I didn't know that! So it's not just about textiles or oils; there are these niche industrial uses too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and globally, industrial hemp is already pretty established for things like building materials, so Kazakhstan's kinda catching up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and globally, industrial hemp is already pretty established for things like building materials, so Kazakhstan's kinda catching up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It does not have a narcotic effect and is used for industrial purposes such as the production of fabric, paper, oil, building materials, and more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like they've thought this carefully—the draft law already passed its first reading in the Mazhilis back in April.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like they've thought this carefully-the draft law already passed its first reading in the Mazhilis back in April.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The corresponding draft law was approved in the first reading by the Mazhilis in April.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And with the Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking involved, they're really trying to preempt any concerns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with the Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking involved, they're really trying to preempt any concerns.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Committee for Countering Drug Trafficking has already issued four licenses to entrepreneurs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a fine line though, right? Because people hear "hemp" and might immediately think of marijuana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a fine line though, right? Because people hear hemp and might immediately think of marijuana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally, but as the Ministry pointed out, low-THC hemp is completely different—no psychoactive effects at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally, but as the Ministry pointed out, low-T H C hemp is completely different-no psychoactive effects at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Internal Affairs stated that there is no reason to worry, noting that low-THC hemp is different from marijuana. It does not have a narcotic effect and is used for industrial purposes such as the production of fabric, paper, oil, building materials, and more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, you gotta wonder how they'll enforce those boundaries long-term, especially with four licenses already out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, you gotta wonder how they'll enforce those boundaries long-term, especially with four licenses already out.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but multi-level control does sound thorough. Let's see how it plays out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but multi-level control does sound thorough. Let's see how it plays out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There will be multi-level control, so there is no cause for concern.
